entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 8:22 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

Temperature: -7.8°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over southern sections. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
